title: Advertising makes product demand less elastic

content.question: A monopolistically competitive firm advertises in order to

choices.label: shift the demand curve for its product to the left.
make the demand for its product less price elastic
make its product more similar to its competitors'
reduce the industry's barriers to entry

content.answer: make the demand for its product less price elastic
